ygData.subject: Re: Exp gain while in parties.....
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, actually that is impossible.  When you re in a group everybody in the group will have their bar move the exact same amount.  The difference is that for
ygData.messageBody:
Well, actually that is impossible. When you're in a group everybody in the
group will have their bar move the exact same amount. The difference is
that for the bar to move that much for the higher lvl characters they need
more exp. That's how the steal xp from the lower guys in a group. Btw, I'm
not accusing everyone in your group of lying. But sometimes it can be very
hard to track your xp bar precisely.. it's very possible the differences in
exp bar movement everyone saw happened because of a little impreciseness,
some rounding, ect, ect...
Another reason why groups are worth it because of solo, is that you don't
have as much downtime.. you can fight, fight.. rest a bit fight... and so
on.. whereas soloing sometimes your downtime won't be big, and others it
will be intermanibly long.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: cinius@... <cinius@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, April 26, 1999 6:28 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Exp gain while in parties.....


>From: cinius@...
>
>Am I the only one with the impression that we're getting screwed when it
>comes to diving up the exp while grouped? I was in a party that ranged from
>level 9 to 12 while I was level 10. Everyone talked about the 'great exp'
>they got, while I was thinking "Man they must never get any Exp". I asked
>about what everyone got after a big fight and the results went something
>like this:
>
>Level 9 got almost a 1/3rd of a bubble
>level 10-12 got close to 1/2 a bubble
>Poor old Cinius the only Wizard in the party saving everyones ass had to
>wait til the next fight to notice a combined total from both fights of 1/4
>of a bubble. Is it like this for anyone else? Hell I get 1/4 of a bubble
>when killing a yellow on my own. In my opinion that makes it worth the risk
>of getting killed by the yellows(happens maybe once out of every 7-10
>kills).
>
>my apologies for the last double mail...had browser problems.
>
>Cinius(Mith Marr)
>
>
>
